channel.title: Bomber (Neutral Killer, variation on Trapper)
channel.description:
When I was writing this I got an automated suggestion that it was similar to [The Trapper](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/class-suggestion-the-trapper/2196) thread from last June, but this idea is slightly different so I'll post it anyway.
**The Bomber** (Neutral Killer)
Nighttime abilities: **Tripwire** (infinite uses): Set a tripwire on a player. If they use any abilities tonight, they will die. Unless you've targeted yourself, in which case anybody who uses an ability on you will die (You can only target yourself a limited number of times).
Daytime abilities: **Timebomb** (limited uses): Set a timebomb on a player, notifying them. They will die after 2 nights, and kill anybody they are visiting along with anybody visiting them. If anybody visits them the first night though, the bomb will be defused.

item.title: Bomber (Neutral Killer, variation on Trapper)
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
Shrimp a NK doesn’t cause mislynchs

This one does lol

How unfair would it be to not be able to kill anyone?

He can always kill, if not at night then during the day with timebomb

But okay I get it nobody likes this idea lol

Read full topic

Shrimp a NK doesn’t cause mislynchs -Insert reaper- they are suppose to be able to kill at night. How unfair would it be to not be able to kill anyone?

item.description:
Needs a way to deal with poison/bleeding.

Read full topic

item.title: Bomber (Neutral Killer, variation on Trapper)
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
What happens if no one uses ability. Very underpowered

Mislynches will happen because people won’t be confirming themselves for fear of setting off the tripwires. And the Bomber can force them to use their abilities by putting timebombs on people, so that someone has to visit them to defuse it, or else let them die.

he has literally no protection or any special killing abilities that make him truly unique.

He has death immunity but I didn’t describe the obvious lol, and how are these abilities not unique? None of these abilities currently exist in the game

Read full topic

item.title: Bomber (Neutral Killer, variation on Trapper)

This, and he has literally no protection or any special killing abilities that make him truly unique.

Read full topic
